=== Current Issues ===
The webcam does not work as well as the mic/headphone jacks.
The area around electric plug hole does light up when when plug is inserted.

==== Notes ====
Wireless card works out of the box.

I heard that there might be a way to getting the webcam to work.

I highly recommend using Automatix for installing your nVIDIA driver as well as other programs.

Beryl works fine.

Please contact me if you have any questions.
